monsterSpecials: Charge. If the rothe moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.
Innate Spellcasting. The deep rothe's spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast dancing lights at will, requiring no components.
monsterActions: Gore. Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.
